## Base Map

```{r}
#| label: fig-ggplotmap
#| fig-cap: CHSA base map using ggplot

ggplot(chsa) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = HA_Name, alpha = CHSA_Pop16 / max(CHSA_Pop16))) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(fill = 'Health Authority', alpha = 'Population') +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = 'Dark2')

```
